algorithm_technique: Iterate through all possible horizontal and vertical cuts, checking sums.
problem_summary_simple: Check if a grid can be split into two equal sum parts with one horizontal or vertical cut.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate total sum, check for evenness, then iterate through rows/columns to find a prefix sum equal to half the total.
key_insights: The total sum must be even for an equal partition.
Prefix sums (or suffix sums) are key to efficiently checking partition sums.
Consider both horizontal and vertical cuts separately.
